It's most likely normal; I think heritrix will increase its crawl
delay if =
it sees that the crawled site is serving pages more slowly.
Check the logs =
for response timeouts too - I think that will trigger a
much longer delay. =
Keep in mind that 0 URIs/sec doesn't necessarily
mean nothing is being retr=
ieved, it just means it's being done at a
rate of less than 1 url every 100=
 seconds.

2009/3/9 Tony Wang <ivytony@...>:

>
